articles.author: Amanda Castro
articles.title: Ukraine-Russia War Live Updates: Trump Allies Accuse Biden of Trying to Start WWIII - Newsweek
articles.description: America is pledging more assistance to Ukraine after Biden authorized the use of U.S. long-range missiles against Russia. Newsweek's blog is closed.
articles.content: The United States is pledging to provide even more assistance to Ukraine after President Biden authorized the use of American long-range missiles against Russia. U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations… [+78398 chars]
